ingredients: Coating 1 cup quinoa ⅓ cup chopped fresh thyme  Zest of 1 large lemon 2 Tbsp kosher salt ½ tsp freshly ground black pepper 2 eggsLamb ¼ cup + 2 Tbsp olive oil 12 (1-inch-thick) lamb chops (about 2 1/2 to 3 lbs), fat removed  Salt and freshly ground black pepperSauce 1 cup creme fraiche 1 Tbsp maple syrup 1 Tbsp chopped fresh thyme  Salt and freshly ground black pepper
